WITH TRT_PRD_G AS ( SELECT TRT.TRT_GRP_CD , TRT.TRT_CD , TRT_NM , PRD.HIN_G_CD , PRD.HIN_G_NAME , MIN(TRT.DISP_SORT) AS TRT_DISP_SORT , MIN(PRD.DISP_SORT) AS PRD_DISP_SORT FROM M_RDM_COM_CAL_USR CAL -- RDM用カレンダー(オンライン用) LEFT JOIN S_RDM_COM_LNK_TRT_PRDGRP_PRD PRD -- 領域別品目グループ品目 ON 1=1 AND PRD.TEKIYO_START_DATE <= CAL.CAL_DATE AND PRD.TEKIYO_END_DATE >= CAL.CAL_DATE LEFT JOIN S_RDM_COM_LNK_TRTGRP_TRT TRT -- 領域グループ・領域関連定義 ON 1=1 AND TRT.TRT_CD = PRD.TRT_CD AND TRT.TEKIYO_START_DATE <= CAL.CAL_DATE AND TRT.TEKIYO_END_DATE >= CAL.CAL_DATE WHERE 1=1 AND CAL.TODAY = '1' GROUP BY TRT.TRT_GRP_CD , TRT.TRT_CD , TRT_NM , PRD.HIN_G_CD , PRD.HIN_G_NAME
UNION
SELECT 'Z' , '00' , '-' , 'Z' , '武田紐' , 0 , 0 FROM M_RDM_COM_CAL_USR )
SELECT NVL(TRT_PRD_G.TRT_NM, '-') AS TRT_NM , NVL(TRT_PRD_G.HIN_G_NAME, '-') AS HIN_G_NAME , NVL(MST.INS_ABBR_NAME, '-') AS INS_ABBR_NAME , NVL(CDM_HOINSTYPE.VALUE1_KANJ, '-') AS HO_INS_TYPE , NVL(MST.INS_ADDR, '-') AS INS_ADDR , NVL(JGI.JGI_NAME, '-') AS JGI_NAME FROM M_RDM_HCO_OYAKO OYAKO -- 施設_領域別親子情報 LEFT JOIN M_RDM_HCO_MST MST -- 施設_基本情報 ON 1=1 AND MST.INS_NO = OYAKO.MAIN_INS_NO LEFT JOIN M_RDM_CODE_MST CDM_HOINSTYPE -- コード情報 ON 1=1 AND CDM_HOINSTYPE.CODE_NAME = 'HO_INS_TYPE' AND CDM_HOINSTYPE.DEL_FLG = '0' AND CDM_HOINSTYPE.VALUE1 = MST.HO_INS_TYPE LEFT JOIN TRT_PRD_G -- サブクエリ（領域・品目グループ） ON 1=1 AND TRT_PRD_G.TRT_CD = OYAKO.TRT_CD AND TRT_PRD_G.HIN_G_CD = OYAKO.HIN_G_CD LEFT JOIN M_RDM_JKR_MR_INS_TRT MR -- RDM用施設担当者情報 ON 1=1 AND MR.INS_NO = OYAKO.MAIN_INS_NO AND MR.TRT_GRP_CD = TRT_PRD_G.TRT_GRP_CD AND MR.TRT_CD = TRT_PRD_G.TRT_CD AND MR.MAIN_MR = '0' LEFT JOIN M_RDM_JGI_SOS_MST JGI -- RDM用組織従業員情報 ON 1=1 AND JGI.JGI_NO = MR.JGI_NO WHERE 1=1 AND OYAKO.INS_NO = #{inInsNo} ORDER BY TRT_PRD_G.TRT_DISP_SORT ASC , TRT_PRD_G.PRD_DISP_SORT ASC

WITH OYAKO AS ( SELECT OYAKO.TRT_CD || OYAKO.HIN_G_CD AS TRT_PRD_CD FROM M_RDM_HCO_OYAKO OYAKO -- 施設_領域別親子情報 WHERE 1=1 AND OYAKO.INS_NO = #{inInsNo} )
SELECT TRT_GRP_CD , TRT_CD , TRT_NM , HIN_G_CD , HIN_G_NAME , TRT_DISP_SORT , PRD_DISP_SORT FROM ( SELECT TRT.TRT_GRP_CD , PRD.TRT_CD , TRT.TRT_NM , PRD.HIN_G_CD , PRD.HIN_G_NAME , MIN(TRT.DISP_SORT) AS TRT_DISP_SORT , MIN(PRD.DISP_SORT) AS PRD_DISP_SORT FROM M_RDM_COM_CAL_USR CAL -- RDM用カレンダー(オンライン用) LEFT JOIN S_RDM_COM_LNK_TRT_PRDGRP_PRD PRD -- 領域別品目グループ品目 ON 1=1 -- TODO 一時コメントアウト -- AND PRD.TEKIYO_START_DATE <= CAL.CAL_DATE -- AND PRD.TEKIYO_END_DATE >= CAL.CAL_DATE LEFT JOIN S_RDM_COM_LNK_TRTGRP_TRT TRT -- 領域グループ・領域関連定義 ON 1=1 AND TRT.TRT_CD = PRD.TRT_CD AND TRT.TEKIYO_START_DATE <= CAL.CAL_DATE AND TRT.TEKIYO_END_DATE >= CAL.CAL_DATE WHERE 1=1 AND CAL.TODAY = '1' AND PRD.TRT_CD = #{inTrtCd} AND PRD.TRT_CD || PRD.HIN_G_CD NOT IN (SELECT TRT_PRD_CD FROM OYAKO) GROUP BY TRT.TRT_GRP_CD , PRD.TRT_CD , TRT.TRT_NM , PRD.HIN_G_CD , PRD.HIN_G_NAME ) GRP ORDER BY TRT_DISP_SORT ASC , PRD_DISP_SORT ASC
